title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: We are seeking a Machine Learning Engineer with strong Python skills and experience in NLP, deep learning, and data pipeline automation. The ideal candidate will have experience with TensorFlow/PyTorch, cloud platforms (AWS/GCP), and deploying ML models at scale. Bilingual capabilities and experience with LLM evaluation is a plus. You'll work on cutting-edge AI solutions for our global customer base.
company_goal: leverage AI to transform how businesses make data-driven decisions
